thread.title: Sharjah bakeries to stop using plastic wrapping
thread.title_full: Sharjah bakeries to stop using plastic wrapping

title: Sharjah bakeries to stop using plastic wrapping
text: | Last updated on February 26, 2017 at 02.13 pm Share Vote All such food products will have to be mandatorily wrapper in paper. Bakeries in the emirate of Sharjah have been told to stop using plastic for wrapping any kind of hot bakery food items such as bread, with immediate effect, the authority announced today.All such food products will have to be mandatorily wrapper in paper.However, food items that are cooled before being packed can still be wrapped in plastic.This decision was taken during a regular meeting of the municipality, headed by Rashid Bin Talaiha, chairman of the municipal council. Afkar Abdullah
